name: Cybersecurity Experts, Log4j, and Open Source by Wicked Good Development
summary: Three industry experts with different ties to the world of software talk about the latest in software, from Log4j to today, and what remediation looks like for development teams. We discuss update behaviors in the development community and the risks associated with using old code. To round out our debut episode - we talk about the silent industrial revolution and who bears the burden of maintaining open source software.
